programme.title: Intersection, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: An architect (Richard Gere) on the brink of a car accident recalls troubles with his wife (Sharon Stone) and his mistress (Lolita Davidovich) in Vancouver, British Columbia.

programme.title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A '50s-era housewife (Julianne Moore) uses her wit and winnings from commercial jingle contests to help support her large family.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: The Deep House, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: While diving in a remote French lake, two YouTubers who specialize in underwater exploration videos discover a house submerged in deep waters. Their dive turns into a nightmare when they discover the house was the scene of atrocious crimes.

programme.title: The Passenger, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Randy is perfectly content to fade into the background, but when one of his co-workers goes on a sudden and violent rampage, he must face his fears and confront his troubled past to survive.

programme.title: There's Something Wrong With the Children, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: Mimic, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: Married scientists (Mira Sorvino, Jeremy Northam) battle killer cockroaches that develop the ability to assume human form.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: A black bird resurrects a rock musician (Brandon Lee) who then avenges his own murder and his fiancee's.

programme.title: Event Horizon, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: Billy, on the move again, ends up in Chihuahua, Mexico, with a new Mexican friend called Segura; together they enjoy several risky escapades -- but in the end, Billy risks losing his life.

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: Billy bumps into a new character called Pat Garrett, who is riding with Jesse and the 7 Rivers Gang; Billy joins them - but law makers are already closing in; they plan to flee to Lincoln County - but not before Billy fulfils one last promise.

programme.title: The Haunting, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Rings, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman (Matilda Lutz) makes a horrifying discovery after her boyfriend (Alex Roe) investigates a story about a mysterious video that kills people seven days after they watch it.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: An Old West sharpshooter (Tom Selleck) goes to Australia, where his new boss (Alan Rickman) expects him to kill Aboriginal Australians.

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: A man with no name (Clint Eastwood) and a man with a mission (Lee Van Cleef) hunt a Mexican bandit (Gian Maria Volonte) for different reasons.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: A former Marine (Thomas Ian Griffith) returns to Vietnam to rescue a comrade (Chris Mulkey) and retrieve nuclear triggers.

programme.title: My Dead Boyfriend, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) goes on a manic quest to learn the truth about her boyfriend after she finds him dead on their couch.

programme.title: Unhuman, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Seven misfit students must band together against a growing gang of unhuman savages. Their trust in each other gets tested to the limit in a brutal, horrifying fight to survive as they take down the murderous zombie creatures.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!!, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Undercover Brother, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: A low-rent private detective poses as a preppy nerd in order to foil a plot by conspirators.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A professional child-finder (Eddie Murphy) is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan boy from a shape-shifting villain (Charles Dance).

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Manhattan playboy (Eddie Murphy) gets a new corporate boss (Robin Givens), and she treats him the way he has always treated women.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hip detective (Eddie Murphy) from Detroit tracks a crime ring to a Los Angeles fun park called WonderWorld.

programme.title: 48 HRS., (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A rumpled detective gets a slick convict released into his custody for two days to help him find a murderer in San Francisco.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Tim's investigation pays off in ways he never imagined and Sigsby scrambles to avert disaster, Luke must finally decide who he can trust.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Happy Birthday!, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: When two friends embark on a journey to the seediest parts of Mexicali for a birthday celebration, they quickly realize their trip has taken a dangerous turn that involves sex, drugs, torture and a ransom involving the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: A Chorus Line, (1985, Musical)
programme.desc: Dancers auditioning for a musical reveal their innermost thoughts and desires in this adaptation of the Broadway show.

programme.title: Into the Wild, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: A top student and athlete leaves his middle-class life to venture into Alaska, only to meet people who will eventually shape his values and life.

programme.title: A House on the Bayou, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Hoping for an idyllic getaway, a couple and their daughter visit a remote mansion in rural Louisiana. When suspiciously friendly neighbors show up uninvited, the weekend soon takes a sinister turn as dark secrets test the family's fragile bond.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem, (2023, Animated)
programme.desc: The Turtle brothers take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.

programme.title: IF, (2024, Family)
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyone's imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Gung Ho, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: American autoworkers have a hard time accepting new work ethics when a Japanese car manufacturer takes over.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: A rich reporter tours outback Australia with a crocodile hunter, then brings him to Manhattan.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two dopey dudes (Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter) go back in time to fetch Beethoven, Napoleon and other biggies for a history project.

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: The dopey dudes (Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter) beat the Grim Reaper (William Sadler) in a board-game contest, so he must help them stop their evil robot twins.

programme.title: Bill & Ted Face the Music, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: The ruler of the future tells best friends Bill and Ted they must compose a new song to save life as we know it. But instead of writing it, they decide to travel through time to steal it from their older selves and bring harmony to the universe.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Eye of the Needle, (1981, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Nazi spy (Donald Sutherland) seduces the wife (Kate Nelligan) of a crippled pilot (Christopher Cazenove) on the Scottish coast before D-Day.

programme.title: Curse of the Pink Panther, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: Interpol sends the world's worst detective (Ted Wass) to find French police inspector Jacques Clouseau.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Ben Kingsley) leads the hunt for a genetically engineered creature who morphs into a human blonde and tries to reproduce in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A half-alien female (Natasha Henstridge) escapes from a government compound to search for the half-alien male who has been raping and fatally impregnating women.

programme.title: Species III, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An alien hybrid beauty (Sunny Mabrey) follows her overwhelming, but deadly, urge to mate while commandos hunt her down.

programme.title: Species: The Awakening, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: With help from her uncle, a woman (Helena Mattsson) who is a half-human, half-alien clone searches for the scientist who created her.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: In the Land of Saints and Sinners, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: Hoping to leave his dark past behind him, former assassin Finbar Murphy leads a quiet life in a coastal Irish town. However, when terrorists show up, he must soon choose between exposing his secret identity and defending his friends and neighbors.

programme.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Optimus Prime and the Autobots take on their biggest challenge yet. When a new threat capable of destroying the entire planet emerges, they must team up with a powerful faction of Transformers known as the Maximals to save Earth.

programme.title: Armageddon, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A NASA rep (Billy Bob Thornton) recruits an oil driller (Bruce Willis) and his team of mavericks to save Earth from an oncoming asteroid.

programme.title: King Kong, (2005, Adventure)
programme.desc: Members (Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody) of a film crew encounter prehistoric beasts and a gigantic ape on mysterious Skull Island.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Tim's investigation pays off in ways he never imagined and Sigsby scrambles to avert disaster, Luke must finally decide who he can trust.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke and Tim go on a desperate search for help as Sigsby uses all of her formidable assets in a last-ditch attempt to keep the Institute's secrets.

programme.title: Three Wishes, (1995, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A frustrated family man recalls an encounter he (Joseph Mazzello), his widowed mom (Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio) and his family had with a mysterious vagrant (Patrick Swayze) in 1955 suburbia.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Adventure)
programme.desc: An imperious woman (Katharine Hepburn) makes a gin-soaked boat captain (Humphrey Bogart) fight Germans in the World War I Congo.

programme.title: Wuthering Heights, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Emily Bronte's Cathy (Juliette Binoche) and Heathcliff (Ralph Fiennes) fuel two generations of gothic romance on the Yorkshire moors.

programme.title: Fame, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Students (Asher Book, Kristy Flores, Paul Iacono) at New York's High School of Performing Arts see if they have the dedication and talent necessary to achieve their dreams.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: An ex-hockey player (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna (Moira Kelly) bicker as paired figure skaters shooting for the Olympics.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: A literary baseball groupie (Susan Sarandon) romances a pitcher (Tim Robbins) and a catcher (Kevin Costner) on a minor-league North Carolina team.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland team's new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A corporate dictator (John Houseman) tries to oust the star player (James Caan) of a brutal 21st-century spectator sport.

programme.title: K2, (1992, Adventure)
programme.desc: A playboy Seattle lawyer (Michael Biehn) and a family-man professor (Matt Craven) join an expedition climbing the Himalayan peak.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: An upstart stock-car driver goes to the edge for his manager, his brain-surgeon girlfriend and himself.

programme.title: Coach Carter, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A high-school basketball coach (Samuel L. Jackson) turns a losing team around, then faces criticism for pushing the athletes to put grades first.

programme.title: School Ties, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A scholarship student (Brendan Fraser) hides his Jewish heritage to fit in at an Eastern prep school in the mid-1950s.

programme.title: K2, (1992, Adventure)
programme.desc: A playboy Seattle lawyer (Michael Biehn) and a family-man professor (Matt Craven) join an expedition climbing the Himalayan peak.

programme.title: Missing in Action, (1984, War)
programme.desc: A U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) escapes from the Viet Cong, then comes back with a floating arsenal to get others out.

programme.title: Missing in Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, War)
programme.desc: An imprisoned U.S. colonel (Chuck Norris) fights the military overlord (Oh Soon-tek) of a slave-labor opium operation in Vietnam.

programme.title: Max, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: The family of a fallen Marine adopts his traumatized service dog, giving both the four-legged veteran and a troubled teen the chance to heal.

programme.title: Max 2: White House Hero, (2017, Children)
programme.desc: Max, a military service dog, is assigned to serve on the U.S. president's Secret Service detail.

programme.title: School Ties, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A scholarship student (Brendan Fraser) hides his Jewish heritage to fit in at an Eastern prep school in the mid-1950s.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: An upstart stock-car driver goes to the edge for his manager, his brain-surgeon girlfriend and himself.

programme.title: Coach Carter, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A high-school basketball coach (Samuel L. Jackson) turns a losing team around, then faces criticism for pushing the athletes to put grades first.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romance)
programme.desc: A New York comedian (Woody Allen) recalls his lost love, a kooky singer (Diane Keaton) with a style all her own.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)

programme.title: A Maldio da Bruxa, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Depois de regressar sua cidade natal, uma adolescente hostilizada pelos aldees que acreditavam que sua me desaparecida era uma bruxa. Agora, eles suspeitam que a filha possa ter os mesmos poderes sombrios.

programme.title: A Face da Morte, (2012, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Enquanto tenta superar a morte da me, Ashley vai para sua nova faculdade onde escuta uma lenda urbana sobre um 'serial killer' cujo apelido virtual "Smiley". O assassino s pode ser visto na internet!

programme.title: Fenmenos Paranormais, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Para o seu reality show sobre caa aos fantasmas, uma equipe de produo se tranca dentro de um hospital psiquitrico abandonado que supostamente assombrado e pode ser que isso seja verdade demais.

programme.title: Tempo Esgotado, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: estao de L.A., o contador Gene mergulha num pesadelo. Dois estranhos separam Watson de sua filha, jogam uma arma na mo dele e prope uma diablica troca: matar uma importante candidata poltico ou nunca mais rever sua filha. A contagem comea...

programme.title: Inimigo em Casa, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando Danny testemunha o assassinato de um homem por seu padrasto Rick, o pai de Danny, Frank, precisa proteger seu filho do maior perigo.

programme.title: Evidncias de um Crime, (2022, Thriller)
programme.desc: Aps a morte de sua esposa, um policial abandona a profisso para cuidar da filha. Ele trabalha limpando cenas de crime, mas uma terefa rotineira acaba ameaando a vida estvel que construiu para a famlia.

programme.title: Jogo Assassino, (2019, Action)

programme.title: O Cartel, (2009, Action)

programme.title: Mercenrio, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: Marley trabalha para a mfia cobrando dividas. Quando uma de suas visitas da errado e ele acidentalmente mata uma mulher, o criminoso acaba preso e com um grande sentimento de culpa. Em busca de redeno, Marley decide cuidar da filha da mulher que matou.

programme.title: Insanidade, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher vai para o campo para passar um fim de semana tranquilo depois de perder o emprego e ter seu ltimo relacionamento complicado chegando ao fim. Ela aluga uma casa de campo de um vivo, que luta para esconder suas tendncias homicidas.

programme.title: Uma Jogada do Destino, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quatro jovens amigos, enquanto pegam um atalho a caminho de uma luta de boxe, testemunham um assassinato brutal que os coloca frente a frente com uma gangue que no ir parar enquanto no acabar com eles.

programme.title: At o Fim!, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: O ex-soldado de Operaes Especiais Jake Hunter est desesperado para encontrar sua filha desaparecida. Enquanto Jake descobre a terrvel verdade em torno do desaparecimento dela, ele parte em uma busca impiedosa por vingana.

programme.title: Um Conto De Fadas Nas Montanhas, (2018, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A pediatra Tasha Mason est focada em manter as crianas de sua enfermaria o mais saudveis possvel. Mas quando o belo Prncipe Alexander Cavalieri quebra a perna em uma pista de esqui, Tasha forada a cuidar de um mimado membro da realeza.

programme.title: Um Sonho de Natal, (2017, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Quando o futuro de sua tradicional loja de Natal ameaada por um ambicioso agente imobilirio, ela deve encontrar uma maneira de convenc-lo que sua loja merece ser salva.

programme.title: A Bela Fera, (2013, Romance)
programme.desc: Isabelle, uma beleza apenas no exterior, conhece Jeremy, um homem spero que se esconde do seu passado.

programme.title: A arte de se apaixonar, (2019, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Uma artista que pinta um mural em uma nova ala hospitalar se apaixona pelo arquiteto do projeto, mas teme que ele no queira estar com ela se ela revelar a histria infeliz por trs de sua lista secreta de coisas para fazer.

programme.title: Madame Bovary, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Numa pacata cidadezinha da Frana do sculo 19, Emma Bovary a bela esposa de Charles Bovary, um mdico da regio. As complicaes na vida de Emma comeam quando ela d incio a uma aventura extraconjugal com o objetivo de se promover na sociedade.

programme.title: As palavras, (2012, Drama)

programme.title: Natal Sob Medida, (2018, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Quando Steven tem que hospedar sua famlia para o Natal, ele recruta a "coordenadora de festas" Gretchen para trazer a alegria natalina para sua casa. O esprito natalino dela une a famlia de Steven, mas nenhum dos dois esperava que isso os aproximasse.

programme.title: Sete dias, (2010, Foreign Romance)
programme.desc: Depois de 12 anos juntos, Tim e May decidem se casar. Tim trabalha demais e muitas vezes est ausente, enquanto May fica sobrecarregada e estressada com a organizao da festa. Faltam apenas sete dias para o casamento. Ser que tudo vai dar certo?

programme.title: Amor pra Cachorro, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Peggy (Shannon) uma alegre secretria que uma tima amiga, colega e irm que vive sozinha com seu querido cachorro, Pencil. Mas uma repentina reviravolta coloca Peggy em um mundo feroz atrs do seu companheiro perfeito.

programme.title: Proposta Indecente, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Demi Moore e Woody Harrelson so Diana e David Murphy, um casal com problemas financeiros que esto apostando numa viagem rpida a Las Vegas para conseguir uma boa mo no jogo de cartas.

programme.title: Tinha Que Ser Voc, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Um deprimido compositor de jingles de Nova York (Dustin Hoffman) e uma solitria burocrata britnica (Emma Thompson) se encontram por acaso em Londres, e um acaba transformando a vida do outro.

programme.title: No O Tipo Da Cinderela, (2018, Romance)
programme.desc: Indy acha que sua vida est bem at que ela conhece um novo cara que a ajuda a descobrir quem ela e o que ela vale.

programme.desc: Baseado no livro de Jorge Amado, o filme conta a histria de Flor que, ao ficar viva do fanfarro Vadinho, casa-se com o correto e metdico Dr. Teobaldo. Com saudades do fogo de Vadinho, Flor conjura a alma do ex-marido e passa a viver com os dois.

programme.title: Vidas Partidas, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Graa e Raul so um casal que se apaixona perdidamente. Os dois se casam e tm duas filhas, formando uma famlia perfeita. Raul gradualmente se torna agressivo e possessivo com sua esposa, resultando em violncia frequente.

programme.title: Desaparecidos, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Em outubro de 2011 uma festa particular em Ilhabela pode ter sido o ltimo destino de seis jovens. O convite entregue a eles vinha acompanhado por uma cmera filmadora, que deveria ser utilizada o tempo todo para registrar imagens aleatrias da diverso.

programme.title: Embarque Imediato, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Wagner decide imigrar ilegalmente para Nova York, mas impedido por Justina, supervisora do aeroporto. Sentindo-se culpada, ela se aproxima do rapaz, criando um forte lao entre os dois.

programme.title: Estao Rock, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Osso vive trs grandes dilemas em sua vida: ao mesmo tempo em que sonha fazer sucesso em uma banda integrada por jovens instveis e imaturos, ele tambm busca se reaproximar dos pais e reconstruir um relacionamento.

programme.title: Garota Dourada, (1984, Drama)
programme.desc: Valente e Patrcia esto casados h cinco anos e tm uma filha, Marli. Patrcia no consegue adaptar-se ao estilo de vida de Valente e o conflito torna-se inevitvel, fazendo com que Patrcia viaje para Nova York.

programme.title: Hector, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Em uma perigosa viagem psicolgica, o ex-policial Hector vive seu passado no presente, no intuito de encontrar respostas para aliviar angstias e descobrir suas culpas para a redeno de seus pecados.

programme.title: Insolao, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Numa cidade vazia castigada pelo sol jovens e velhos confundem a sensao febril da insolao com o incio delicado da paixo. Como espectros eles vagam entre construes e descampados em busca do amor inalcanvel.

programme.title: Metania, (2015, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Eduardo cresceu na periferia de So Paulo e teve uma boa educao de sua me, Solange. Apesar disso, Eduardo mergulha no universo das drogas e se torna usurio de crack. A me, desesperada, tenta ajudar o filho a se livrar da dependncia qumica.

programme.title: Motorrad, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: Motoqueiros em busca de aventura acabam fazendo uma trilha em um local proibido e cercado por belezas naturais. Mas a atmosfera de tranquilidade transformada em medo e morte.

programme.title: Kakashi est em vantagem na batalha contra Zabuza, mas a situao se reverte quando Kakashi preso na Priso de gua de Zabuza! Kakashi insisite para que a equipe fuja, mas Naruto lembra da promessa que fez de nunca mais fugir e decide ficar!!
programme.desc: Naruto: O Juramento De Dor

programme.title: Graas ao plano de Naruto, Kakashi escapa da Priso de gua. Zabuza derrotado e ferido, mas de repente um misterioso ninja rastreador aparece e mata Zabuza. Naruto se espanta ao ver um garoto no muito mais velho que ele derrotar Zabuza to facilmente.
programme.desc: Naruto: Kakashi, O Guerreiro Sharingan

programme.title: Recuperando-se na casa de Tazuna, Kakashi conclui que Zabuza no morreu e que o jovem ninja o ajudou a escapar! Kakashi decide comear um novo treinamento para ajudar Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura a controlarem melhor seus chakras!
programme.desc: Naruto: A Floresta do Chakra

programme.title: Na aldeia com Tazuna, Sakura v o sofrimento do povo no Pas das Ondas governado por Gato. Tazuna constri uma ponte que dar acesso a outras terras para as pessoas no dependerem mais de Gato. Naruto e Sasuke treinam, usando chakra para subir em rvore.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Terra Onde Uma Vez o Heri Viveu
programme.sub-title: A Terra Onde Uma Vez o Heri Viveu

programme.title: Enquanto Naruto treina para controlar seu chacra, algum misterioso aparece de repente e diz que, para se tornar forte, preciso ter determinao para proteger o que ama. A figura misteriosa ecoa o sentimento de Naruto, e os dois sentem uma conexo.
programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Na Ponte: Zabuza Retorna

programme.title: hora de lutar contra Zabuza outra vez, e agora ele est acompanhado do ninja rastreador. Os dois reparam as habilidades de Sasuke, e ele percebe o imenso poder do ninja mascarado. Sasuke e o ninja se preparam para lutar, como se o destino os chamasse.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Jutsu Secreto De Haku: Espelhos De Cristal De Gelo
programme.sub-title: O Jutsu Secreto De Haku: Espelhos De Cristal De Gelo

programme.title: Sasuke est em apuros dentro dos Espelhos Cristal de Gelo de Haku, e Naruto chega para salv-lo. Sasuke tem um plano para combater o jutsu de Haku, mas falha por causa das aes inesperadas de Naruto. Por fim, os dois jovens ninjas so presos.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Ninja Nmero Um Hiper Ativo E Cabea Oca Entram Na Briga
programme.sub-title: O Ninja Nmero Um Hiper Ativo E Cabea Oca Entram Na Briga

programme.title: Vendo que no h tempo a perder, Kakashi decide usar o Sharingan mais uma vez para derrotar Zabuza. Mas Zabuza um ninja experiente em batalhas mortais e, na primeira vez em que enfrentou o Sharingan, Zabuza conseguiu bolar uma estratgia.
programme.desc: Naruto: Visibilidade Zero: O Sharingan Desvendado

programme.title: Naruto e Sasuke so atacados dentro dos Espelhos Cristal de Gelo de Haku. Durante a batalha, Sasuke percebe o poder do seu prprio Sharingan e comea a desviar dos ataques de Haku. Haku decide acabar com ele. Sasuke usa seu corpo para proteger Naruto...
programme.desc: Naruto: O Selo Quebrado

programme.title: Naruto finalmente explode! Sua raiva por Haku libera o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. O chakra de Naruto est to intenso que at Kakashi e Zabuza, que esto lutando distncia, percebem. Haku incapaz de fazer algo diante do poder secreto de Naruto.
programme.desc: Naruto: Passado Branco, Ambio Escondida

programme.title: Haku pede a Naruto que acabe com ele. Naruto questiona a filosofia de Haku sobre existir apenas para lutar e ganhar. Enquanto isso, a batalha entre Kakashi e Zabuza chega ao clmax. Com a vitria ao alcance, Kakashi libera sua manobra mais devastadora.
programme.desc: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi

programme.title: Pensando em Haku, Naruto confronta Zabuza com raiva. Sem demonstrar emoes, Zabuza se sente arrasado pela perda de Haku, a nica pessoa em quem confiava no mundo. Naruto aprende que esse tipo de realidade cruel , de fato, o destino de um ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Demnio Na Neve

programme.title: Naruto e sua equipe voltam Aldeia Oculta da Folha depois da batalha do Pas das Ondas. Mesmo concluindo novas misses, Naruto est insatisfeito com a rotina diria, mas logo ele descobre que estrangeiros esto se juntando na Aldeia da Folha.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura so escolhidos para fazer a Prova Chunin. Iruka se ope participao dos trs, pois os considera muito novos e inexperientes para o desafio. Kakashi, porm, acredita que eles cresceram e esto mais prontos do que nunca.
programme.desc: Naruto: Identifique-Se : Novos E Poderosos Rivais

programme.title: Enquanto Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se preparam para a prova, um ninja chamado Rock Lee aparece. Lee quer lutar contra Sasuke, que possui o poder do cl Uchiha. Sasuke aceita o desafio de Lee, mas fica s na defesa devido aos ataques rpidos desse oponente.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke
programme.sub-title: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke

programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam
programme.sub-title: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam

programme.title: Naruto e sua equipe iniciam a primeira prova. O examinador Ibiki Morino, um jonin (ninja de alto nvel) notrio e perito em interrograo. Sasuke e Sakura esto preocupados, pois se Naruto responder tudo errado, eles tambm falharo.
programme.desc: Naruto: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea
programme.sub-title: Liguem Os Motores A Prova Chunin Comea

programme.title: A parte mais difcil da prova comea na pergunta 10. Antes dos ninjas escutarem a pergunta, Ibiki coloca uma regra injusta para o problema: quem responder errado ser reprovado e no ter o direito de fazer qualquer Prova Chunin no futuro.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada
programme.sub-title: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada

programme.title: Konohamaru, neto do Terceiro Hokage da Aldeia da Folha, aparece durante a Prova Chunin com Moegi e Udon e cobre eventos para o jornal da Academia Ninja. Ele v Naruto como um irmo mais velho e, entrevistando os personagens, reconta suas aventuras.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Floresta Da Morte

programme.title: Na floresta da morte comea a segunda parte da Prova Chunin. Cada time recebe um tipo de pergaminho e deve roubar o outro tipo de outro time, chegando ao ponto final na torre com os dois pergaminhos.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte
programme.sub-title: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte

programme.title: A segunda parte da prova comea na floresta da morte. Sasuke nota que um inimigo se disfarou de Naruto. Sasuke salva e desamarra Naruto, e os trs membros criam uma senha para quando ficarem separados outra vez.
programme.desc: Naruto: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta
programme.sub-title: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta

programme.title: O ataque do ninja da Grama poderoso demais para Sasuke e Sakura. Sasuke pensa em entregar o pergaminho, mas Naruto o impede. A raiva de Naruto cresce e seus poderes so revelados.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!
programme.sub-title: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!

programme.title: Ao ver Naruto lutar contra o ninja da Grama, Sasuke percebe que estava errado em fugir. Sasuke usa todo o potencial do seu Sharingan para afastar o ninja. Ele se apresenta como Orochimaru, some e deixa uma Marca da Maldio em Sasuke, que cai em dor.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago
programme.sub-title: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago

programme.title: Depois de ver a reportagem, Anko percebe um intruso na prova, Orochimaru, mas no consegue det-lo. Sakura, cansada e com medo, tenta impedir o inimigo. O autoproclamado demnio bonito da Aldeia da Folha, Rock Lee, aparece para o resgate!
programme.desc: Naruto: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo
programme.sub-title: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo

programme.title: Protegendo Sakura, que no consegue mais se mover, Lee luta contra os trs ninja do Som. Ele usa sua habilidade secreta, mas ineficaz. Dosu o ataca, e Lee cai. Para proteger as pessoas que so importantes para ela, Sakura se levanta...
programme.desc: Naruto: Sakura Floresce

programme.title: Enquanto Sakura se defende dos ninjas do Som sozinha, o time rival Ino aparece! Depois de ver Sakura lutar contra os ninjas do Som, eles decidem ajud-la. Com a formao de batalha "Ino-Shika-Cho", o time Ino tenta deter os atacantes
programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho

programme.title: Os ninjas do Som partem depois de enfrentar o poder de Sasuke. O time de Naruto tem um momento para se recuperar. Kiba consegue o segundo pergaminho e seu time vai em direo torre. O parceiro canino de Kiba, Akamaru, nota algo adiante e para.
programme.desc: Naruto: Akamaru Treme: A Fora Cruel De Gaara
programme.sub-title: Akamaru Treme: A Fora Cruel De Gaara

programme.title: Naruto e a equipe finalmente descansam. J se passaram quatro dias desde o incio da prova, restando apenas um para o fim. Naruto sugere duplicar o pergaminho do cu, que ainda precisam ter, e tenta abrir o pergaminho da terra, supostamente selado.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, No Permitido Olhar
programme.sub-title: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, No Permitido Olhar

programme.title: O time de Naruto se junta a Kabuto, mas eles so presos por um genjutsu (tcnica ilusria). Eles caminham na mesma rea vrias vezes, perdem energia e lutam contra os vrios clones criados pela tcnica. Naruto os derrota, mas o nmero no diminui.
programme.desc: Naruto: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus So Melhores Que Os Seus
programme.sub-title: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus So Melhores Que Os Seus

programme.title: Quando Naruto e seu time chegam a torre e abrem os dois pergaminhos, Iruka aparece e explica o esprito do ninja chunin (nvel mdio) aos estudantes da Academia Ninja. Agora ele confia em Naruto e seu time. Anko fala com o Hokage sobre Orochimaru.
programme.desc: Naruto: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez
programme.sub-title: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez

programme.title: Os 21 ninjas que passaram na segunda parte da prova se juntam para o prximo desafio. Seus rostos demonstram vrias emoes profundas. Mas como um nmero muito alto passou na segunda prova, as preliminares da terceira comearo imediatamente...
programme.desc: Naruto: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao!
programme.sub-title: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao!

programme.title: Na terceira prova os combates so um contra um. O primeiro entre Sasuke e Yoroi, o capanga de Orochimaru. Yoroi encurrala Sasuke, que no consegue usar seu Sharingan por causa da Marca da Maldio no pescoo. Yoroi absorve o chakra para fora de Sasuke.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Cime Do Sobrancelhudo, A Rajada De Lees Se Solta!
programme.sub-title: O Cime Do Sobrancelhudo, A Rajada De Lees Se Solta!

programme.title: Kakashi desfaz o feitio de Sasuke, e Orochimaru aparece. Ele quer o poder de Sharingan que o cl Uchiha possui. Nas preliminares da terceira prova, Zaku da Aldeia Escondida do Som luta contra Shino da Aldeia Oculta da Folha.
programme.desc: Naruto: Kakashi E Orochimaru Cara A Cara
programme.sub-title: Kakashi E Orochimaru Cara A Cara

programme.title: O prximo combate entre o membro do time de Gaara, Kankuro, e o capanga de Orochimaru, Misumi. Misumi captura Kankuro, usando um corpo que consegue deslocar suas partes e juntas.
programme.desc: Naruto: Exploso Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011, Action)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as guas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: Sangue Oposto, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Dmitri e James, dois poderosos assassinos de elite contratados pelo governo, se reconectam aps seu ltimo trabalho no Sudeste Asitico.

programme.title: Liga dos Deuses, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: A histria conta como o Rei Zhou de Shang se torna um tirano devido s astcias de Daji, um esprito vixen que est disfarado como uma de suas concubinas.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Batalha dos Imprios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legio de mil soldados no pas e com o comandante do protetorado das Regies Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na Amrica, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li Wong Fei-Hong, heri chins que vai Amrica, salvo por ndios e luta contra a explorao de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: The Russians Are Coming, The Russians Are Coming, (1966, Comedy)
programme.desc: Alan Arkin and Jonathan Winters lead an all-star cast (Carl Reiner, Eva Marie Saint, Brian Keith, Theodore Bikel) in this outrageous comedy about a Russian submarine that runs aground off the New England coast.

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep, (1958, War)
programme.desc: The legendary Clark Gable and Burt Lancaster star in this gripping, classic military drama as a submarine commander (Gable) drives his men and his 1st officer (Lancaster) to the brink of mutiny in his quest to sink an enemy sub. Robert Wise directs.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for seven Academy Awards, including Best Picture, and winner of two (1953, Best Art Direction-Set Decoration and Best Costume Design), this stunning biography of artist Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec is flawlessly directed by John Huston.

programme.title: A Scandal in Paris, (1946, Thriller)
programme.desc: Born in a French prison in 1775, Franois Eugne Vidocq becomes a professional thief and is later appointed chief of Parisian police.

programme.title: Paris Blues, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: Ram (Paul Newman) and Eddie (Sidney Poitier) are two expatriate jazz musicians living in Paris, where their music is celebrated. When they fall in love with two vacationing American girls, they must decide if they should move back to America with them.

programme.title: Paris When It Sizzles, (1964, Romance)
programme.desc: Richard Quine directs George Axelrod's acerbic script (adapted from Julien Duvivier's La Fte Henriette) in this romantic comedy that reunites William Holden and Audrey Hepburn for the first time since 1954's Sabrina.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Adventure)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Adventure)
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Adventure)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Quarantine, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: When a news crew decides to trail a brave fire-fighting team, they never suspect that the first call for help they respond to that night may be their last. Now they're trapped in an apartment complex sealed off by the government. Rating: R

programme.title: Quarantine 2: Terminal, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: Earlier tonight, a bizarre disease was unleashed in a run-down Los Angeles tenement... and no one got out alive. Yet something escaped. Now, aboard Flight 318, the first symptoms begin to show. Rating: R

programme.title: Red Eye, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: Moments after takeoff, Lisa's seatmate, Jackson, menacingly reveals the real reason he's on board: He is an operative in a plot to kill a rich and powerful businessman .... And Lisa is the key to its success.

programme.title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of teens must solve a deadly mystery in this film inspired by one of the most terrifying book series of all time, and produced by Oscar winner Guillermo del Toro.

programme.title: Carrie, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: When four teenagers all meet with mysterious deaths exactly one week after watching a videotape, investigative reporter Rachel Keller tracks down the video... and watches it.

programme.title: Mo' Money, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: You can never be too rich...or too funny. Comedian Damon Wayans brings his rogue's gallery of outrageous characters to this action-filled comedy about a con artist who tries to go straight, but keeps getting pulled in the wrong direction.

programme.title: Breakin' All the Rules, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Inspired by his fiance (who dumped him), a man publishes a break-up hand-book for men, becoming a best-selling author in the process.

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing hes got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighborhood, to be their puppet.

programme.title: Pootie Tang, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Pooties one-man war against greed, injustice, and unwholesome consumer products starts cutting into profits at LecterCorp, the companys demented CEO plunges him into a super-funk, by swiping his magical belt!

programme.title: The Ladies Man, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: Leon loses his radio show because of his Xrated on-air comments. He then gets a letter from a former flame promising him a lifetime of wealth and happiness, things start looking up!

programme.title: Trading Places, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor.

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing hes got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighborhood, to be their puppet.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: The Defender, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Lance and his team are bodyguards for NSA's head sent by the president to a secret meeting outside Bucharest which is attacked. But Why?

programme.title: Skin Trade, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Detective Nick Cassidy (Dolph Lundgren) goes to Bangkok after Viktor Dragovic (Ron Perlman), the human trafficker who killed his family. Agent Eddie Reed is sent to bring Nick home, and Thai detective Tony Vitayakui questions Nick's motives.

programme.title: Bangkok Dog, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Special agent Andrew Kang intercepts a drug shipment and goes undercover in Bangkok's criminal underworld. Posing as a cartel operative, he must gain the gang's trust, but as the lines blur, he risks losing himselfand his way out.

programme.title: One-Percent Warrior, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: After his devastatingly fast, samurai-style combat approach sets filmmakers against him, a legendary action star (Tak Sakaguchi) films his own movieon turf claimed by feuding yakuza gangs, including Japans deadliest martial arts assassin.

programme.title: Bad City, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: In poverty-stricken Kaiko City, a corrupt mayoral candidate eliminates rival mafias, prompting a released ex-cop to lead a treacherous battle for justice with a special task force in the gritty underworld.

programme.title: Raging Fire, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Shan (Donnie Yen) is a hardline cop with a long history of success, but his past comes back to haunt him when a sting is attacked by a group led by his former protg (Nicholas Tse), a man set on destroying everyone who ever wronged him.

programme.title: Iron Monkey, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Presented by Quentin Tarantino, Iron Monkey is the spirited tale of a mysterious and mythical Chinese legend in this exhilarating non-stop martial arts excitement.

programme.title: Tai Chi Master [Cantonese-Language Version], (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Oscar night. Will someone please kick that numbskull off-stage? Wait! Thats no ordinary numbskull. Thats Lt. Frank Drebin, crashing the ceremonies to stop a terrorist plot!

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Leslie Nielsen stars as Police Squad's own granite-jawed, rockbrained cop Frank Drebin, who bumbles across a mind control scheme to assassinate Queen Elizabeth.

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lt. Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen) loves a mystery. Why are we here? Is there life after sex? Yes, Drebin tackles the big issues and the biggest of all is how to stop devious Quentin Hapsburgs (Robert Goulet) plan to destroy the environment!

programme.title: Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Oscar night. Will someone please kick that numbskull off-stage? Wait! Thats no ordinary numbskull. Thats Lt. Frank Drebin, crashing the ceremonies to stop a terrorist plot!

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Eurotrip, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Europe will never be the same again after Scotty Thomas and his buddies take off for the express to excess! They're hooking up with hot strangers and jamming all the extreme insanity they can into the wildest trip of their lives!

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Julie & Julia, tells the true stories of how Julia Child's life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking.

programme.title: No Strings Attached, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A hilarious story about Emma and Adam who set up a seemingly perfect arrangement with each other based soley on sex and having only one cardinal rule: No Strings Attached.

programme.title: 40 Days and 40 Nights, (2002, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

programme.title: Two Night Stand, (2014, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand.

programme.title: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters, (2020, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Diane Keaton, Jeremy Irons, and Maggie Grace lead this warmhearted romantic comedy that follows a colorful cast of characters searching for love against the backdrop of a wedding.

programme.title: What Women Want, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: After an accident, a chauvinistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.

programme.title: About Adam, (2001, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: When carefree Lucy (Kate Hudson) finally meets her perfect man, Adam (Stuart Townsend), she's ready to give up her wild ways and settle down for good. But while Lucy is busy making plans for her wedding, Adam is busy charming the rest of her family!

programme.title: 40 Days and 40 Nights, (2002, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo, (2011, Crime)
programme.desc: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

programme.title: Enough, (2002, Crime)
programme.desc: An abused wife on the run from her violent husband finally decides she's had enough.

programme.title: The Fan, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: When the San Francisco Giants pay centerfielder Bobby Rayburn (Wesley Snipes) $40 million to lead their team to the World Series, no one is happier or more supportive than #1 fan Gil Renard (Robert De Niro). Rating: R

programme.title: In the Line of Fire, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gripping, gut-wrenching thriller that delivers suspense in almost unbearable doses, IN THE LINE OF FIRE showcases Clint Eastwood at his finest. In a performance that won universal acclaim, Eastwood stars as Frank Horrigan. Rated: R

programme.title: Get the Gringo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A career criminal nabbed by Mexican authorities is placed in a tough prison, where he learns to survive with the help of a young boy.

programme.title: Payback, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

programme.title: Dahmer, (2002, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Jeffrey Dahmer (Jeremy Renner, "The Hurt Locker") was vilified when authorities discovered he had murdered, dismembered and even tried to consume the bodies of 15 young men in Milwaukee.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Hired to steal a rare painting, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

programme.title: Tears of the Sun, (2003, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: After a West African president's family is assassinated and civil unrest is rampant, a top-secret team is deployed to the far reaches of the jungle to rescue a U.S. doctor who is acting as a missionary.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Truman doesnt realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: In 1776 South Carolina, widower and legendary war hero Benjamin Martin (Mel Gibson) finds himself thrust into the midst of the American Revolutionary War as he helplessly watches his family torn apart by the savage forces of the British Redcoats.

programme.title: Marie Antoinette, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Written and directed by Academy Award winner Sofia Coppola, Marie Antoinette is an electrifying yet intimate re-telling of the turbulent life of history's favorite villainess. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Boyhood, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmed over twelve years with the same cast, Richard Linklater's acclaimed smash hit is a groundbreaking celebration of life. Stars Ethan Hawke and Patricia Arquette.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Truman doesnt realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Doubt, (2008, Drama)
