programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Luffy crosses paths with the clever thief Nami. A navigator on a quest to collect one hundred million berries, shes perfect for Luffys new crew except for the fact that Nami hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!

programme.title: Having delivered a deadly blow to Captain Buggys pirates, Luffy and his companions need a place to recuperate. But the three are not in hiding very long before the Beast Tamer Mohji seeks them out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!

programme.title: In the ongoing fight with Captain Buggys pirates, Zoro must face off with the Acrobat Cabaji while Luffy continues to do battle with the Pirate Clown himself.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!

programme.title: Luffy and the gang are on the run after the battle with Captain Buggy! With no place to go and nothing else to do, Nami finally agrees to join Luffy on his quest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Who is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami arrive at an island hoping to obtain a ship and crew, but the three are quickly confronted with the blustering Captain Usopp who has a connection to Luffys past.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy follows Usopp to the mansion and encounters the brutal pirate Captain Kuro. The scoundrel plans to claim Kayas fortune and live the stolen life of luxury.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!

programme.title: Usopp spreads the word of Kuros evil plot and the impending pirate attack, but no one believes his warnings. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to help Usopp put a stop to the dastardly scheme.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!

programme.title: Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but theyve prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!

programme.title: In an effort to save Usopps village, the Straw Hat Pirates seek to block the marauders path from the sea. With Luffy out of the battle, Zoro must face the fearsome Meowban Brothers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami manages to rescue Zoros missing swords and attempts to revive Luffy. With one of the Meowban brothers down, the other rages on even more fiercely than before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!

programme.title: Usopps friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!

programme.title: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!

programme.title: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates efforts to save her with a ship to call their own the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!

programme.title: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!

programme.title: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the worlds greatest swordsman but tragedy intervened.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!

programme.title: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!

programme.title: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merrys found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!

programme.title: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!

programme.title: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!

programme.title: The Going Merrys been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the actions not dead in the water Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls At Sea!

programme.title: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Kriegs pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things arent looking too good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!

programme.title: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!

programme.title: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action, and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!

programme.title: The scoundrel Don Krieg appears to have the upper hand in his fight with Luffy. To avoid walking the plank, the rubber man must try a different strategy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy vs. Krieg!

programme.title: The standoff between Luffy and Don Krieg takes a turn in favor of the Straw Hats when their captain focuses his onslaught on his opponents weaponry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!

programme.title: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets Off With Luffy!

programme.title: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami whos on a collision course with a deadly foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!

programme.title: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!

programme.title: A fierce argument over where Namis loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one things for sure no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!

programme.title: Namis adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmakers younger days.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Nojiko continues the story of Namis younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!

programme.title: Nezumi comes to confiscate Namis treasure, but whos he working for? More importantly, whos Nami working for, and whats she gonna do with her booty?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.
programme.sub-title: The Killers Gather in the Wasteland

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.
programme.sub-title: Zenigata's Pride and the Desert Dust

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chlo's Bistro. Chlo is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.
programme.sub-title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.
programme.sub-title: The Bow, The Princess, and the Terrorist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.
programme.sub-title: 50th Anniversary Special - Is Lupin Still Burning?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #19: The Elusiveness of the Fog
programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay comes the best 'Transformers' ever! With humanity facing extinction from a terrifying new threat, it's up to the Autobots to save Earth. They'll need new allies, including inventor Cade (Mark Wahlberg) and the Dinobots!

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Arrival, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When mysterious spacecraft touch down across the globe, an elite team - led by expert translator Louise Banks (Academy Award nominee Amy Adams) races against time to decipher their intent.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Arrival, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When mysterious spacecraft touch down across the globe, an elite team - led by expert translator Louise Banks (Academy Award nominee Amy Adams) races against time to decipher their intent.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: Rio Lobo, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: This fifth and final collaboration between John Wayne and director Howard Hawks is an action-filled Western set after the Civil War, in which a group of men seek out Union traitors responsible for a string of train robbers.

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: The Hills Run Red, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Rio Lobo, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: This fifth and final collaboration between John Wayne and director Howard Hawks is an action-filled Western set after the Civil War, in which a group of men seek out Union traitors responsible for a string of train robbers.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher whos continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar-winning roles.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: Hot Rod, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: A comedy about a stunt man whos never successfully landed a jump without wiping out and his attempt to master the biggest stunt of his life.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: She's Out of My League, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this comedy, Kirk, an average guy, cant believe his luck when the successful and gorgeous babe Molly falls for him. His smart-ass friends, his crazy family, and even his obnoxious ex-girlfriend are just as shocked as he is.

programme.title: Up in the Air, (2009, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Ryan (George Clooney) flies all over for work, but after meeting a passenger he learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections we make along the way.

programme.title: Ghost World, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: The story of neo-cool Enid and Rebecca who, faced with graduation from high school take a hard look at the world they wryly observe. When Rebecca focuses her attention on mutual romantic fixation Josh, the girls friendship is forever changed.

programme.title: Hot Rod, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: A comedy about a stunt man whos never successfully landed a jump without wiping out and his attempt to master the biggest stunt of his life.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: She's Out of My League, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this comedy, Kirk, an average guy, cant believe his luck when the successful and gorgeous babe Molly falls for him. His smart-ass friends, his crazy family, and even his obnoxious ex-girlfriend are just as shocked as he is.

programme.title: A new arrival at the Hilltop opens up about the leader of a group of mask-wearing savages; a search party sets out on a daring mission to find two missing friends.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The savage group led by Alpha confronts the Hilltop in a harrowing attempt to retrieve her daughter; a supply run for the Kingdom turns into a dangerous quest.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: While one community struggles to ease tensions that threaten to divide from within, the true nature of another group comes into focus; a mission to rescue a friend has deadly consequences.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl's daring rescue mission forces Alpha to unleash a group of her own to retrieve what belongs to her, even if the price is paid in blood; the Kingdom's plans to reunite the communities are put in jeopardy.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: An outsider's arrival forces Alexandria to rehash devastating old wounds; eye-opening secrets from the past are revealed.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Pulse With Bill Anderson
programme.desc: Featuring topical discussions and interviews around current issues and events.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Para deter um assassino racista, Shaft precisa localizar as nicas testemunhas que podem coloc-lo atrs das grandes. O perigo s aumenta enquanto Shaft investiga.

programme.title: A Casa Amaldioada
programme.desc: Neste suspense sobrenatural de tirar o flego com as maiores estrela de Hollywood, um estudo sobre o medo vira um pesadelo para um professor e seus trs objetos de estudos presos em uma misteriosa manso.

programme.title: Jogada de Risco
programme.desc: John (John C. Reilly), um fracassado encalhado em Reno, est duro. a que chega Sydney, que fica com pena dele, paga um caf da manh e lhe d algumas dicas sobre como ganhar dinheiro nos cassinos. Dois anos depois, John torna-se parceiro de Sydney.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, inflexvel e politicamente incorreto, tero a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata.

programme.title: Obsesso Fatal
programme.desc: Aps uma tentativa de assalto sua casa, um casal de Los Angeles chama a polcia e conhece o detetive Pete Davis, que parece ser gentil e atencioso. Mas a amizade se transforma numa obsesso doentia,

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Sobreviva a noite
programme.desc: Um intenso filme de ao, que traz Dolph Lundgren como um agente da Interpol protegendo sua esposa e filha de um criminoso implacvel e seus mercenrios em um vilarejo italiano.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Quando uma expedio desaparece no Congo, um grupo enviado para procura-la, em uma aventura cheia de acontecimentos, tecnologia e muito suspense.

programme.title: Jogo de Morte
programme.desc: Quando a CIA no consegue resolver um problema, o agente Marcus entra no jogo. Ele ter que escolher entre a lealdade com sua equipe ou fazer o que certo durante uma misso aps um segurana de um diplomata e sua equipe sofrerem um atentado.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: O Estrangeiro
programme.desc: Um empreiteiro militar britnico Lex Walker informado que sua filha morreu. Ao chegar em Los Angeles, ele descobre que o corpo no de sua filha, e uma investigao comea.

programme.title: Don't Look - A Morte te aguarda
programme.desc: Nicole leva quatro amigos para um fim de semana no campo durante o feriado de Ao de Graas, sem revelar a eles o segredo maligno que paira sobre o rancho.

programme.title: Voo 7500
programme.desc: Um voo sai dos Estados Unidos para o Japo, durante as dez horas de voo os passageiros pensam em como se distrair ... at perceberem uma presena estranha e sobrenatural dentro do avio.

programme.title: Pnico nas Alturas
programme.desc: Cinco jovens, que querem celebrar o Ano Novo no topo de uma montanha, ficam presos em um telefrico quando uma terrvel tempestade tem incio. O que era para ser uma festa de aventura, logo se torna uma luta pela sobrevivncia.

programme.title: A Casa Silenciosa
programme.desc: Uma jovem fica presa dentro do refgio beira do lago de sua famlia e se torna incapaz de entrar em contato com o mundo exterior enquanto foras sobrenaturais assombram a casa com energias e consequncias misteriosas.

programme.title: Sombra da Morte
programme.desc: Christy volta para casa aps a morte de sua irm Vanessa, e assombrada por profticas vises de violncia e assassinato, que comeam a se tornar realidade.

programme.title: Jessabelle: O Passado Nunca Morre
programme.desc: Uma jovem forada a voltar para a casa de seu pai, na Louisiana, quando um acidente de trnsito a deixa incapacitada, sem poder usar as pernas.

programme.title: O jogo do abismo
programme.desc: Liu Chenchen, junto com seu namorado, entra em um cruzeiro para participar de uma caa ao tesouro. Mas o que comeou como um jogo inocente com promessas de uma grande recompensa, logo se transforma em uma batalha pela sobrevivncia!

programme.title: Armadilha Explosiva
programme.desc: Uma especialista em desarmar bombas est presa em seu prprio carro junto de seu filho e a namorada dele - uma mina foi instalada no veculo e ela ser detonada em 30 minutos. Agora, um jogo de tenso e pacincia tem incio..

programme.title: Sem Rastros
programme.desc: Wendy e Paul descobrem que sua filha Taylor desapareceu sem deixar vestgios durante uma viagem em famlia. Quando a polcia no tem nenhuma pista, os dois no param por nada para encontr-la.

programme.title: Teia de Corrupo
programme.desc: Liam um ex-presidirio que tenta reconquistar o amor e a confiana de sua famlia. A busca de redeno de Liam o levar a uma rede de conspirao, crime e corrupo.

programme.title: Red Stone: Caada Mortal
programme.desc: Um adolescente testemunha o assassinato de seu irmo mais velho nas mos de um senhor do crime local. Quando ele encontra uma pedra valiosa que seu irmo havia escondido, ele percebe que um preo logo estar em sua cabea.

programme.title: O Advogado dos 5 Crimes
programme.desc: Um advogado expulso da Ordem leva o crdito pelo livro de um amigo falecido, que se torna um grande sucesso, mas a situao se inverte mais cedo do que ele suspeitava.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Grito Silencioso
programme.desc: Uma cidade inteira vtima de uma sanguinria criatura que caa humanos baseando-se em sons. Ser uma silenciosa batalha pela sobrevivnvia!

programme.title: Primeira Chegada
programme.desc: Alex est flutuando inconsciente em um lago quando a luz de um OVNI a salva, aumentando suas habilidades, como telecinese e poder de cura. Seu amigo Sean a ajuda. As autoridades a querem - no apenas por roubar um carro da polcia.

programme.title: A Invaso
programme.desc: Depois que sua pequena cidade australiana aniquilada por um ataque areo avassalador, um grupo de civis foge da captura e descobre que agora esto entre os ltimos sobreviventes de uma invaso extraterrestre que engolfou todo o planeta.

programme.title: Os Escolhidos
programme.desc: Lacey e Daniel descobrem que sua famlia o alvo de uma fora mortal inimaginvel e aterrorizante. Ambos tero que fazer tudo ao seu alcance para resolver este mistrio escuro e salvar suas vidas.

programme.title: Terremoto
programme.desc: Quando uma srie de terremotos comea a destruir Los Angeles, Emily e Jason correm pelas runas da cidade na esperana de desviar o epicentro para salvar milhes de vidas.

programme.title: O ltimo Refgio
programme.desc: Tov Matheson um veterano de guerra com transtorno de estresse ps-traumtico que percebe que o fim do mundo est chegando. Depois de se relacionar com um duvidoso Messias, ele deixa sua vida normal para iniciar a construo de um abrigo subterrneo.

programme.title: Luta pela liberdade
programme.desc: Liam, um homem de quem tudo o que tinha sido tirado da priso, tenta reconstruir sua vida, apaixonando-se por quem no deveria e seguindo o estranho modo de vida de uma famlia violenta.

programme.title: Aliana Mortal
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canad-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Foras Especiais, a ajud-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: Mercenrio
programme.desc: Marley trabalha para a mfia cobrando dividas. Quando uma de suas visitas da errado e ele acidentalmente mata uma mulher, o criminoso acaba preso e com um grande sentimento de culpa. Em busca de redeno, Marley decide cuidar da filha da mulher que matou.

programme.title: A Fivela de Abner Outlaw
programme.desc: Durante uma terrvel tempestade, um serial killer causa estragos dentro de uma priso do Texas.

programme.title: Operao Perigosa
programme.desc: Depois que uma transao de drogas no d certo, dois traficantes nova-iorquinos se deslocam para Miami, onde estabelecem uma operao de fraude de crdito lucrativo.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Jogada de Risco
programme.desc: John (John C. Reilly), um fracassado encalhado em Reno, est duro. a que chega Sydney, que fica com pena dele, paga um caf da manh e lhe d algumas dicas sobre como ganhar dinheiro nos cassinos. Dois anos depois, John torna-se parceiro de Sydney.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que no voltaria para a Tailndia, mas algum o seda e o fora a retornar ao pas asitico.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal
programme.desc: Manji um samurai altamente qualificado que torna-se amaldioado com a imortalidade aps uma lendria batalha. Ele decide ajudar uma jovem que est movida pelo dio e pela sede de vingana.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: O Justiceiro
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notrio criminoso chins.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro
programme.desc: Com Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah e Katie Holmes. Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, uma dona de casa comea a trabalhar limpando a Casa da Moeda e tem uma ideia: chamar suas amigas para roubar notas de dinheiro que seriam destrudas.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco
programme.desc: Ruggero um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Armadas e Perigosas
programme.desc: Quando um vigarista tenta passar a perna nessas quatro avs, elas acidentalmente o matam.

programme.title: A Copa do Peru
programme.desc: Patrick Hodges no volta para sua pequena cidade h anos. Mas seus velhos amigos o convencem a voltar para o Dia de Ao de Graas para for-lo a terminar o lendrio Turkey Bowl um jogo de futebol que foi interrompido pela neve h 15 anos.

programme.title: As Gatinhas do Sul
programme.desc: Belle e Bell querem escapar de suas vidas no parque de trailers e ir para a "Cidade Grande" de Atlanta. Bem quando eles pensam que esto a caminho de pegar um p de meia, Bell se apaixona por um policial bonito chamado Rhett Butler.

programme.title: Quem Morto Sempre Aparece
programme.desc: Um agente de viagens endividado (Robin Williams) tenta arrecadar um milho de dlares alegando que um cadver seu irmo desaparecido.

programme.title: Entre Dois Mundos
programme.desc: Ryan um jovem escritor que acredita que ter sucesso com seus textos romnticos e uma vida tranquila.

programme.title: 10 Coisas que Deveramos Fazer Antes de nos Separar
programme.desc: Na noite em que Abigail conhece Ben em um bar, eles, de forma cmica, comeam a listar uma srie de coisas que deveriam fazer antes, caso eles fossem um casal, se separarem - isso, sem eles sequer pensarem de fato em terem um relacionamento.

programme.title: Como Treinar o Seu Marido
programme.desc: Uma terapeuta matrimonial tenta consertar seu prprio casamento concentrando-se em como mudar seu marido.

programme.title: Sobrou Pra Voc
programme.desc: Abbie e Robert so amigos com muita coisa em comum: jovens, tm uma viso no-convencional da vida, inteligentes, impulsivos e um terrvel azar no amor. Eles fariam um par perfeito, se no houvesse um problema: Robert gay.

programme.title: Pronta para Amar
programme.desc: Marley Corbett uma jovem divertida com medo de se entregar completamente a um relacionamento. Ela tenta usar o humor para impedir que os problemas se agravem, mas pega de surpresa quando descobre que est com uma doena grave.

programme.title: Solteiros com Filhos
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig, Maya Rudolph e Jon Hamm estrelam ao lado de Jennifer Westfeldt e Adam Scott em uma "comdia inteligente e espirituosa de relacionamento" (Entertainment Weekly) sobre um crculo de amigos cujas vidas mudam quando eles tm filhos.

programme.title: Por amor
programme.desc: Walter e Linda tm tragdias familiares em comum. Por isso, eles acabam se apegando um no outro emocionalmente a fim de superar seus traumas e, quem sabe, terem um destino juntos...

programme.title: Madame Bovary
programme.desc: Numa pacata cidadezinha da Frana do sculo 19, Emma Bovary a bela esposa de Charles Bovary, um mdico da regio. As complicaes na vida de Emma comeam quando ela d incio a uma aventura extraconjugal com o objetivo de se promover na sociedade.

programme.title: As palavras
programme.desc: Um escritor no auge de seu sucesso literrio descobre o alto preo que deve pagar por roubar o trabalho de outro homem.

programme.title: Natal Sob Medida
programme.desc: Quando Steven tem que hospedar sua famlia para o Natal, ele recruta a "coordenadora de festas" Gretchen para trazer a alegria natalina para sua casa. O esprito natalino dela une a famlia de Steven, mas nenhum dos dois esperava que isso os aproximasse.

programme.title: Agora e Para Sempre
programme.desc: Namorados desde os tempos da escola, Liam e Miam vivem agora um casamento j desgastado pela falta de paixo e a falta de tempo.

programme.title: Retiro romntico
programme.desc: Depois de um rompimento, a jornalista Dana Willingham se v em um retiro de ioga onde conhece Stefan Gonzales, um guru da tecnologia, envolvido em um escndalo. No entanto, Dana se apaixona por Stefan e precisa escolher entre a carreira e o amor.

programme.title: Tudo acontece em Elizabethtown
programme.desc: Drew Baylor designer que, em um belo dia, tem sua vida jogada de pernas para o alto. A caminho de Elizabethtow, Drew conhece Claire. Ela bonita e decidiu acompanhar Drew em sua jornada de volta para casa.

programme.title: A Presa
programme.desc: Um grupo de mulheres embarca para uma caminhada numa trilha e so atacadas por um grupo de caadores, que as perseguem e torturam mata adentro. Em uma batalha extrema pela sobrevivncia, as pessoas so capazes do impensvel quando esto no limite.

programme.title: A Viagem
programme.desc: Uma explorao de como as aes de vidas individuais impactam umas s outras no passado, presente e futuro, como uma alma vai de assassino a heri, e um ato de bondade se espalha ao longo dos sculos para inspirar uma revoluo.

programme.title: Deteno
programme.desc: Um grupo de homens comuns em busca de dinheiro fcil se oferecem como voluntrios em uma experincia cientfica. Confinados numa priso abandonada, eles sero divididos em dois grupos, os prisioneiros e os guardas.

programme.title: K-PAX: O Caminho da Luz
programme.desc: Um estranho surge do nada, aps uma confuso numa estao ferroviria. Afirmando ser de um planeta distante, K-Pax, Prot desafia cientistas e chama a ateno do Dr. Powell, cujo ceticismo inicial rapidamente se transforma em fascnio e espanto.

programme.title: O Menino do Pijama Listrado
programme.desc: Uma amizade proibida se forma entre Bruno, o filho de um comandante nazista, e Schmuel, um menino judeu mantido prisioneiro em um campo de concentrao.

programme.title: O ltimo Pr do Sol
programme.desc: Belle Breckenridge e John Becheridge esto se preparando para uma jornada com o gado at o Texas, at que chega a casa deles o caubi Brendan O'Malley.

programme.title: A Face Oculta
programme.desc: Aps fugir de um roubo em um banco do Mxico um dos assaltantes, Dad Longworth, v a chance de ficar com o ouro roubado e deixar Rio, seu cmplice, para ser capturado.

programme.title: Rio Vermelho
programme.desc: Thomas Dunson dono de um imprio, um verdadeiro rei do gado. Junto com seu filho adotivo Matthew Garth ele inicia uma longa viagem com parte de seu rebanho, indo do Texas ao Missouri.

programme.title: A Morte Anda a Cavalo
programme.desc: Bill Meceita testemunha o assassinato de sua famlia quando criana e cresce com desejo de vingana. Ele se une a Ryan, um pistoleiro, e saem procura do bandido Walcot, mas ele logo descobre que Ryan esconde um segredo sobre o seu passado.

programme.title: Viva Django!

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Shippo conhece uma garota chamada Satsuki. Satsuki acredita que seu irmo, que foi guerra, voltar. Ela mostra a Shippo o tesouro que seu irmo lhe deu, um fragmento de Jia. Infelizmente, apenas uma flor feita de pedra.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E1

programme.title: Os maridos esto sendo atrados para longe de sua aldeia por uma bela youkai. Suas esposas pedem a Mirok para derrot-la. Preocupado com ele, Sango o acompanha. Mas Sango separada dele por uma nvoa estranha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E2

programme.title: Tokajin sequestra Agome. Inuyasha escapa do jardim em miniatura com a ajuda de Mirok e os outros e vai salvar Agome. Enquanto escapa, ele encontra uma flor com o rosto de um velho sbio.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E4

programme.title: Sango retorna para a sua vila e conserta o Osso Voador. Ela tambm coloca o pai e as cinzas de seus companheiros para descansar. Quando ela est prestes a sair, ela atacada.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E5

programme.title: Narak chama uma sacerdotisa chamada Tsubaki. H cinquenta anos ela foi derrotada por Kikyo quando foi atrs da Jia. Ela uma sacerdotisa sombria que vendeu sua alma a um youkai para manter sua juventude e agora est atrs do sangue de Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S3E6
